content.question:
www.lacma.org

In the malagan mask shown, the artist organized the composition to convey a sense of formal balance by

choices.label: adding a variety of textural accents to the smooth wooden form
positioning motifs asymmetrically to enhance the uniqueness of the surface patterns
carving similar elements on either side of a centrally placed vertical axis
building in additional features to customize the standard mass-produced base

content.answer: carving similar elements on either side of a centrally placed vertical axis

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
